name: Compel Tongue, Mass
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Black Markets © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as compel tongue, except it affects multiple creatures. The same language restriction applies to all creatures, and the same language must be imparted to all creatures affected by the same casting of this spell.
target_zh: 一个生物/等级，任两者之间不得超过30呎。
text_zh: 此法术如同授言术(Compel Tongue)一般作用，不过它能影响复数生物。所有生物适用相同的语言限制，并且所有受相同法术的生物必须被施加相同的语言。
